thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Romantic design hotel
thread.title_full: Romantic design hotel - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MourneGirl
title: Romantic design hotel
text:
We stayed for one night at the Hotel Monge on a short break in Paris. The hotel is a short walk from the metro station and well located for walking to restaurants, attractions and shops around the Left Bank.
The hotel is stylish and has been furnished and decorated with great care and attention to detail. Our room was great - a large comfortable bed, and a large and striking bathroom. Both looked perfectly presented and could have been in a design magazine. The bathroom had a generous supply of L'Occitane toiletries.
We didn't have breakfast in the hotel, but there are a number of cafes a short walk away.
A special and charming place to stay in Paris.
